title: Ep 27: The Illusion of Control
description: Why do we think we can control anything? How much of life do we even control really? Why do I feel the need to make sure my dog eats and poops regularly or it will be the end of the world? Also, wouldn't Blythe Danner make a great mom for me?
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
